Recommendations: inservice training for personnel be conduct to provide reorientation on the implementation of correct communication channel
budgeting must be participatory so that the college is involve in the budget preparation especially in allocate fund for research activity for faculty and personnel
the dean faculty and administration should work together to strengthen their linkage
there should be a monitoring system in the implementation of the development plan
there should be a regular update of the development plan
the function of the head of office should be clearly state and well define
